quotes.quote: The world is twice as crazy as it's ever been.
If you want to accomplish twice as much, you have to work twice as hard.
The sky is the limit. You never have the same experience twice.
Once is happenstance. Twice is coincidence. Three times is enemy action.
Once is never. Twice is always.
Think twice before you speak, because your words and influence will plant the seed of either success or failure in the mind of another.
The sad truth is that opportunity doesn't knock twice.
It is not once nor twice but times without number that the same ideas make their appearance in the world.
Each must in virtue strive for to excel; That man lives twice that lives the first life well.
We are twice armed if we fight with faith.
It is good to express a thing twice right at the outset and so to give it a right foot and also a left one. Truth can surely stand on one leg, but with two it will be able to walk and get around.
In general, mankind, since the improvement of cookery, eats twice as much as nature requires.
Twice and thrice over, as they say, good is it to repeat and review what is good.
Everything that happens once can never happen again. But everything that happens twice will surely happen a third time.
We have two ears and one mouth so that we can listen twice as much as we speak.
You could not step twice into the same rivers; for other waters are ever flowing on to you.
If you have no confidence in self, you are twice defeated in the race of life.
A mother has to think twice, once for herself and once for her child.
To teach is to learn twice.
Even a stopped clock is right twice a day.
Look twice before you leap.
Think twice before burdening a friend with a secret.
Good things, when short, are twice as good.
Think before you act; think twice before you speak.
To think twice is quite enough.
If we could be twice young and twice old we could correct all our mistakes.
All things are created twice. There is a mental (first) creation, and a physical (second) creation.
It is twice as hard to crush a half-truth as a whole lie.
If a job's worth doing, it's worth doing twice.
A good example has twice the value of good advice.
